items.title: National Park Service drops free admission on Martin Luther King Jr. Day and Juneteenth while adding Trump’s birthday

items.title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon says Europe has a ‘real problem’
items.description: “We need a long-term strategy to help them become strong,” Dimon said. “A weak Europe is bad for us.”

items.title: SpaceX to offer insider shares at record-setting $800 billion valuation
items.description: Elon Musk on Saturday denied that SpaceX is raising money at a $800 billion valuation without addressing Bloomberg’s reporting on the planned offering...

items.title: The most likely solution to the U.S. debt crisis is severe austerity triggered by a fiscal calamity, former White House economic adviser says
items.description: "Eventually, in the unforeseeable future, austerity may be the most likely of the six possible outcomes."
